desc: Bare Necessities creates all natural and organic Body butters, Scrubs, Soaps, Toners, Serums, Masks and many other Skin and Body care products. Each products' recipe is formulated from years of research, personal experience and trial & error to find the best combinations of natural ingredients.

layout.text: Bare Necessities was created FOR US, BY US. All natural skincare and body care products for Men, Women & Children of all ages and all skin types. Including eczema, psoriasis, dry skin and sensitive skin.
